title: FitTrack – Personalized Fitness & Nutrition Planner
goal: Build a habit-based planner using goals, BMI, and calorie targets.
why_it_matters: One-size-fits-all plans fail; people need adaptive routines.
data: Calorie datasets, exercise lookup tables, sample user logs.
ai: Simple recommendation engine (linear regression or rule-based).
Optionally use embeddings for food-exercise similarity.
workflow: Suggest daily plan of meals + exercises.
